title: Side effects and complications of cervical cryotherapy.
summary: The side effects and complications of 1248 cervical cryosurgeries performed in the course of 12 years are scrutinized. The side effects (hypogastric discomfort, vascular reactions) are negligible, a profuse vaginal discharge should be reckoned with fol …
abstract: The side effects and complications of 1248 cervical cryosurgeries performed in the course of 12 years are scrutinized. The side effects (hypogastric discomfort, vascular reactions) are negligible, a profuse vaginal discharge should be reckoned with following the treatment.
